items.sentence: I agreed to have a drink with Tom after work.
Do you know what we\'re supposed to be doing?
You\'re a pretty good guitarist, aren\'t you?
You\'re almost as old as Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re asking me a question I can\'t answer.
You\'re back sooner than I thought you\'d be.
You\'re brighter than most of Tom\'s friends.
Tom told me where he was planning to do that.
Tom took Mary to the best restaurant in town.
Tom took a bottle of pills out of his pocket.
Tom has been trying to contact Mary all week.
I suppose you\'ve already applied for a visa.
Tom loosened his tie and removed his glasses.
Tom loves to lie in the grass on a sunny day.
Tom loves us all, but he loves Mary the most.
Tom made a list of places he wanted to visit.
Tom and Mary decorated the gym with balloons.
Tom and Mary divided the apples between them.
No one would blame you if you left right now.
Tom is one of the nicest guys I\'ve ever met.
